author: Simon Difford
description: A light mojito made more complex with bianco vermouth.
name: Jamie's Mojito
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR first 4 ingredients into glass with lime wedges and mint
Half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir)
Fill glass with more crushed ice and TOP with Prosecco
